Sentence.string: Robert, I have questions for you. Please, answer.
I read in an interview that the relationship between you were quite distant with your father lately. Do you still think he didn’t deserve the success he had?
In any case, he deserved what happened to him yesterday.
You’re hard on him, he was your father.

Listen, Marcus was everything but a father to me. What happened to him is a fair reward. Marcus was playing with fire. He spent money lavishly and he was pally with crooks recently. He was drinking since a couple of years and became violent. My mother, my sister and I didn’t recognize him anymore.
